stats.unlimited: You have unlimited access to all features.

premium.clipboardCaptureDesc: Instantly capture text, images, and links to Notion

premium.thankYouDesc: You're supporting the development of Clipper Pro. New features are coming soon!

billing.cancelingDescription: Your access will end at the end of the billing period.
billing.trialDescription: Enjoying your free trial with all Premium features.
billing.premiumDescription: Thank you for being a Premium subscriber!

cancelWarning.title: Your subscription is set to cancel
cancelWarning.description: You will lose access to Premium features after the current billing period. You can reactivate anytime before then.

trial.title: You are on a free trial
trial.description: Enjoy all Premium features during your trial period. Your card will be charged when the trial ends.

workspaces.title: Notion Workspaces
workspaces.noteText: Each Notion workspace can only be linked to one Clipper Pro account. This helps prevent abuse and ensures fair usage.
workspaces.confirmDisconnect: Are you sure you want to disconnect this workspace? You can reconnect it later.

forgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
forgotPassword.subtitle: Enter your email and we'll send you a reset link.
forgotPassword.successMessage: If an account exists with this email, we've sent you a password reset link.

resetPassword.title: Reset your password
resetPassword.subtitle: Enter your new password below.
resetPassword.successMessage: Your password has been successfully reset. You can now sign in with your new password.
resetPassword.invalidLinkMessage: This password reset link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters

hero.badge: Early Bird: First 500 Users Get $2.99/mo Forever
hero.subtitle: Offline mode ✓ Better parsing ✓ Native desktop app.
hero.subtitleError: No more "go online" errors. Premium quality that works.

offline.title: Works Offline
offline.description: Local queue syncs automatically when you're back online. Never lose a clip again.

instant.title: Instant Capture
instant.description: One keyboard shortcut. Clipboard to Notion in under 2 seconds. Simple as copy-paste.

analytics.title: Usage Analytics
analytics.description: Track your clipping activity. See patterns. Optimize your workflow.

howItWorks.title: Simple as Copy-Paste
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps. Zero friction. Maximum productivity.

step2.title: Auto-detection
step2.description: Clipper Pro instantly detects new clipboard content.

step3.title: Send to Notion
step3.description2: Done. Saved to Notion in under 2 seconds.

showcase.title: See It In Action
showcase.subtitle: A glimpse of the Clipper Pro experience. Clean, fast, and powerful.

comparison.title: Why Choose Clipper Pro?
comparison.subtitle: Built for people who work offline. Not another browser extension.

cta.title: Ready to clip offline?
